URDU 322 Intermediate Urdu (5) VLPA
Systematic expansion of vocabulary and grammar. Intermediate-level prose and poetry readings. Expansion of skills in reading, writing, speaking, and listening comprehension. Second in a sequence of three.

URDU 424 Survey of Modern Hindi/Urdu Literature: Drama (3/5, max. 10) VLPA H. PAUWELS
Survey of Hindi-Urdu literature from the late nineteenth century to the present. Readings from representative dramas. Modern Hindi-Urdu theater in North India is important historically and, its influence on popular movies of Bollywood, forms an important part of contemporary popular culture of South Asia.
